meanings.definition: The exchange of goods or services for money.
meanings.sent1: I went to the sale to buy some new clothes.
meanings.sent2: The sale at the store attracted many customers looking for discounts.
meanings.sent3: At the sale, I ended up buying more than I planned because everything was so cheap.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was on sale today, brightening up the room with joy.
meanings.sent5: The sale sign outside the shop caught my attention, promising great deals.

meanings.definition: An event where goods are sold at reduced prices.
meanings.sent1: During the sale, I bought a new phone for half the price.
meanings.sent2: The Black Friday sale drew huge crowds to the mall.
meanings.sent3: At the sale, people were rushing to grab the discounted items like it was a race.
meanings.sent4: The atmosphere at the sale was electric, with everyone eager to find bargains.
meanings.sent5: She felt like a winner after scoring a fantastic deal at the sale.
